Deities @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Asmodeus]{Asmodeus}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Dwarven Pantheon]{Dwarven Pantheon}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Eritrice]{Eritrice}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Gruhastha]{Gruhastha}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Hastur]{Hastur}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Imot]{Imot}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Irez]{Irez}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Lady Jingxi]{Lady Jingxi}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Lissala]{Lissala}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Magdh]{Magdh}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Magrim]{Magrim}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Mephistopheles]{Mephistopheles}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Nalinivati]{Nalinivati}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Nethys]{Nethys}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Pillars of Knowledge]{Pillars of Knowledge}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Sivanah]{Sivanah}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Thoth]{Thoth}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Valmallos]{Valmallos}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Wards of the Pharaoh]{Wards of the Pharaoh}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Winlas]{Winlas}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Ydajisk]{Ydajisk}

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Redact]{Redact}; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Ghostly Transcription]{Ghostly Transcription}

You wield power over written words and symbols.
name: Glyph Domain
